## Enterprise UX/UI Checklist (mandatory)
- [ ] C1 state coverage attached (`docs/ux/baselines/state-coverage.json` kept up to date)
- [ ] Morning + Night screenshots attached
- [ ] Loading/empty/error/conflict/permission checked for critical screens
- [ ] Keyboard-only flow validated (search -> detail -> edit -> save/cancel + unsaved-close)
- [ ] A11y gate output attached (no high/critical)
- [ ] Message taxonomy gate output attached
- [ ] UX latency SLO report attached
